item.description:
OK....No need to explain this one. If you have never heard of Hall & Oates you must have slept right through the 1980's. Daryl Hall; a mega star is coming to perform some of his greatest hits such as "Sara smile," "Rich Girl," "Private Eyes," "I Can't Go For That," "Maneater," and so many more :-)

Let's get together and enjoy some wine appetizers and yummy desserts under the stars. We can dance the night away or rock and roll in our lounge chairsâ€¦what ever floats your boat :-)

There will have a huge crowd at it so I suggest that people get there as early as possible. As usual I will fly purple and yellow balloons so you can find us. Joining us will be PartyExpress and New Haven Wine and Dining!

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Daryl Hall - Hamden Free Concert
